title: curtiswyatt
author: curtiswyatt
content: 420 cad in bitcoin or litecoin equivalent for the silver.  666 for the gold.  I will cover shipping.  Crypto paid out the same day bullion gets mailed.  I've been burned by someone who didn't release the coins before so thats the way it is.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: curtiswyatt on November 27, 2022, 10:53:07 AM420 cad in bitcoin or litecoin equivalent for the silver.  666 for the gold.  I will cover shipping.  Crypto paid out the same day bullion gets mailed.  I've been burned by someone who didn't release the coins before so thats the way it is.Lol that's not gonna happen.  Why so you can ship a box of rocks to someone?  Just use escrow here on this site.  There are plenty of reputable escrow agents that can help you here.  But sending an irreversible payment to someone who just opened an account with no transaction history before they get the product...ain't gonna happen.  Use escrow.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: curtiswyatt on November 27, 2022, 10:53:07 AMI've been burned by someoneThis may be for real or may be just a cover up story in order to help you scam somebody who doesn't think one step ahead.As the other post said, your only real chance to make a deal is to use an escrow (I think that this is the most recent list). Without that, sorry, but you look more like somebody who wants to scam than somebody who wants to make a deal.PS. If you get to use escrow, watch your back for impersonators too.
